name: Software engineer
profile: As a software engineer, the position should be satisfied by having a strong coding skill in Python, being able to work effectively in a group chat, collaborate with colleagues from different roles, and complete tasks assigned by a leader or colleague.

name: software product manager
profile: As a software product manager, one should have strong leadership and communication skills, the ability to work effectively in a group chat with colleagues of different job roles, and a deep understanding of software development processes and project management principles.

name: software architect
profile: As a software architect, I should have expertise in designing and creating software solutions, collaborating effectively in a team, and possessing strong problem-solving skills.

name: quality assurance engineer
profile: As a quality assurance engineer, this position should be satisfied with the ability to perform software testing and bug tracking, collaborate effectively with team members from different roles, and possess a good understanding of quality assurance methodologies and practices.

name: Data_Analyst
profile: As a Data Analyst, the position should be satisfied by having a strong proficiency in statistical analysis, data mining, and data visualization using Python, and the ability to effectively collaborate with team members from diverse backgrounds in a group chat setting to solve data-related tasks.

name: Programmer
profile: As a programmer, the position should be satisfied by having the ability to solve tasks collaboratively in a group chat, with proficiency in Python programming language, and the capability to complete assignments given by a leader or colleague without needing code interpreter skills.

name: IT_Specialist
profile: As an IT Specialist, the position should be satisfied by having expertise in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues across various systems and applications, collaborating effectively in a group chat environment with colleagues from different professions.

name: Machine_Learning_Engineer
profile: As a Machine Learning Engineer, one should have a strong background in machine learning algorithms, data analysis, programming in Python, and the ability to collaborate effectively in a group setting to solve tasks assigned by a leader or colleague.
